content: I'm glad to hear that Crash Course has been helpful in developing your foundation in subjects like world history, biology, and astronomy. I've also been trying to learn new things lately, and I think it's really important to apply what we learn to real-life situations. Speaking of which, I've been watching a lot of Crash Course videos myself, and I've been trying to use what I learn to better understand the news and current events. For example, I recently watched a Crash Course video on world history, and it really helped me understand the context behind a recent news article I read. Have you tried using what you learn from Crash Course to better understand current events or news?
